headline: This Vegas-Inspired Signal Could Hand You Rapid Gains by July 30
summary: Editor’s Note: As you may know, I’ve built my career on spotting data-driven edges in the market before major turning points hit. I mention this because I recently got a chance to “test drive”a strategy developed by my longtime colleague, Keith Kaplan, CEO of TradeSmith. And I have to tell you, it’s one of the most impressive strategies I’ve come across in 50 years in this business. It’s called the “green day” phenomenon – a pattern that pinpoints when certain stocks are historically most likely

headline: Analog Devices price target raised to $270 from $248 at Stifel
summary: Stifel analyst Tore Svanberg raised the firm’s price target on Analog Devices (ADI) to $270 from $248 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The inventory correction in the broader semiconductor industry over the past two years appears to have bottomed and a cyclical recovery is now likely underway, but the pace of the recovery remains uncertain, the analyst tells investors in an earnings preview for the group. The firm continues to recommend an Overweight position in AI-related semiconductor sto
